derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'masquerade or masqued ball'): probably a back-formation (with spelling influenced by French masque 'mask') from masker, from Italian mascar 'person wearing a mask'

means.word_mean: 1. a party of guests wearing costumes and masks
